alert.note: Alert for Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morris County through 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Council Grove Lake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Council Grove and Council Grove Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
